trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bullhead City
There were no other sightings in Bullhead City on or around May 26th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to work pulling a early morning shift. It was still quite dark out. I was traveling south on Hwy 95 in Bullhead City Arizona. A light amber colored orb caught my eye to the east. It was moving quite slow in a east north east trajectory. It continued over the Black Mountains range until it was out of sight. I called my wife and told her about the event and asked if she would go outside and look to the west to see if she would be able to see the object from her position which is in Golden Valley hoping to see it appear on the other side of the mountains from her position. She was unable to spot the object.
